g.text: FROM THE CREATOR OF NOTHING IMPORTANT
Every frequency has a secret. Every signal has a price.
DIRECTED BY REIN WEYLANT WRITTEN BY REIN WEYLANT PRODUCED BY REIN WEYLANT
MUSIC BY CLASSIFIED SOUND DESIGN: FLIPPER ZERO NOISES CATERING: ESPRESSO MACHINE
A COMPASCUUM PRODUCTIONS FILM SHOT ON LOCATION IN DRENTHE, NIEDERSACHSEN & ZOETERMEER
FEATURING: LOFAR · WSRT · DWINGELOO · KLOOSTER TER APEL · STECKERDOSER HEIDE
